beer.beer_description:
Made for moments just like these. ⁠
This highly approachable Pale Ale is packed full of fruit flavor with just a touch of bitterness to balance it all out. Pack it with you for your next Summer adventure and keep on the sunny side of life.⁠
We taste: Peach • Passion Fruit • Tangerine⁠

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 30 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 7!

user.bio: I like meat.  I like beer.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.badge_description:
Start the season off right with your friends from Punch Cigars! Get to know the Official Cigar of Beer Lovers a little better here: www.punchcigars.com.
For sale in the U.S. only.
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 220 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 45!

Eat all the food.
Drink all the beer.
Live life with ZERO regrets, as we're never guaranteed tomorrow.

items.badge_description:
Beer and music share many similarities; different styles, different collaborations, some smooth, some loud. It’s no wonder they go together so well!

That's a beer at 15 different Music Venues! Visit 5 more different ones for Level 4!

user.bio: Zymurgist for 14+ years. More of a Malthead than a Hophead.  Love to brew my own and try others creations.

items.badge_description: The traditionally accepted payment for helping someone move, pizza & beer are one of the most perfect combinations in life. That's a beer at 60 different venues categorized as a Pizza Place. Try 5 more for Level 13!

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 385 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 78!

beer.beer_name: Some Came Apricot Pale Ale (Small Batch Ltd)
